text:
@realDonaldTrump .
Even though you don't believe or support #BlackLivesMatter, you must think Black Votes Matter, right?

If the #coronavirus pandemic is under control in the U.S., why are rally attendees required to agree to your #COVID19 wavier to attend?

#VoteBlue2020
https://t.co/O5MmSIOvgW
